verses.verse: Deliver<WH5337> me from my enemies,<WH341> my God.<WH430> Set me on high<WH7682> from those who rise up against me.<WH6965>
Deliver<WH5337> me from the workers<WH6466> of iniquity.<WH205> Save<WH3467> me from the bloodthirsty<WH1818> men.<WH582>
For,<WH693> behold, they lie in wait for my soul.<WH5315> The mighty<WH5794> gather<WH1481> themselves together against me,<WH6588> not for my disobedience, nor for my sin,<WH2403> Yahweh.<WH3068>
I have done no wrong,<WH5771> yet they are ready<WH3559> to attack<WH7323> me.<WH5782> Rise up,<WH7200> behold, and help me!<WH7125>

You,<WH3068> Yahweh God<WH430> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> rouse<WH6974> yourself to punish<WH6485> the nations.<WH1471> Show no mercy<WH2603> to the wicked<WH205> traitors.<WH898> Selah.<WH5542>
They return<WH7725> at evening,<WH6153> howling<WH1993> like dogs,<WH3611> and prowl around<WH5437> the city.<WH5892>
Behold,<WH5042> they spew with their mouth.<WH6310> Swords<WH2719> are in their lips,<WH8193> "For,<WH8085>" they say, "who hears us?"
But you,<WH3068> Yahweh, laugh<WH7832> at them.<WH3932> You scoff at all the nations.<WH1471>
Oh,<WH5797> my Strength, I watch<WH8104> for you,<WH430> for God is my high tower.<WH4869>
My God<WH430> will go before<WH6923> me with his loving kindness.<WH2617> God<WH430> will let me look<WH7200> at my enemies in triumph.<WH8324>
Don't<WH2026> kill them,<WH5971> or my people may forget.<WH7911> Scatter<WH5128> them by your power,<WH2428> and bring them down,<WH3381> Lord<WH136> our shield.<WH4043>

For the sin<WH2403> of their mouth,<WH6310> and the words<WH1697> of their lips,<WH8193> let them be caught<WH3920> in their pride,<WH1347> for the curses<WH423> and lies<WH3585> which they utter.<WH5608>

Consume<WH3615> them in wrath.<WH2534> Consume<WH3615> them,<WH3045> and they will be no more. Let them know that God<WH430> rules<WH4910> in Jacob,<WH3290> to the ends<WH657> of the earth.<WH776> Selah.<WH5542>
At evening<WH6153> let them return.<WH7725> Let them howl<WH1993> like a dog,<WH3611> and go around<WH5437> the city.<WH5892>
They shall wander up and down<WH5128> for food,<WH398> and wait<WH3885> all night if they aren't<WH7646> satisfied.

But I will sing<WH7891> of your strength.<WH5797> Yes,<WH7442> I will sing aloud of your loving kindness<WH2617> in the morning.<WH1242> For you have been my high tower,<WH4869> a refuge<WH4498> in the day<WH3117> of my distress.<WH6862>
To you,<WH5797> my strength, I will sing<WH2167> praises.<WH430> For God is my high tower,<WH4869> the God<WH430> of my mercy.<WH2617>
